name: @mugan86/api-github
description: Acceso a la API de Github de un usuario

scripts.publish.patch: git add . && git commit -m "Update with patch" && npm version patch && git push origin master
scripts.publish.minor: git add . && git commit -m "Update with minor" && npm version minor && git push origin master
scripts.publish.major: git add . && git commit -m "Update with major" && npm version major && git push origin major

author: Anartz Mugika Ledo
